mapper.select: SELECT tmp.httpSum AS httpSum, tmp.httpConnectSum AS httpConnectSum, tmp.httpDisconnectSum AS httpDisconnectSum, tmp.httpUnsentSum AS httpUnsentSum, IFNULL(round(tmp.httpConnectSum * 100 / tmp.httpSum, 2), '100.00') AS httpConnectRate FROM ( SELECT COUNT(ID) AS httpSum, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN mar.`STATUS` = 200 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS httpConnectSum, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN mar.`STATUS` != 200 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS httpDisconnectSum, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN mar.`STATUS` is null OR mar.`STATUS` = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS httpUnsentSum FROM MONITOR_HTTP mar) tmp
